mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goodsName = #{goodsName}, goodsColor = #{goodsColor}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice}, size = #{size}, totalAmount = #{totalAmount} WHERE goodsNo = #{goodsNo}

update tradegoods as tg, goods as g set g.totalAmount = g.totalAmount + tg.amount where classification="입고" or classification="출고반품" and g.goodsNo=tg.goodsNo and dealNumber=(Select max(dealNumber) from tradegoods)

update tradegoods as tg, goods as g set g.totalAmount = g.totalAmount - tg.amount where classification="출고" or classification="입고반품" and g.goodsNo=tg.goodsNo and dealNumber=(Select max(dealNumber) from tradegoods)
mapper.select: select goodsName,goodsColor,size from goods where goodsNo=#{goodsNo}
